title: Technology-Enhanced Instructional Design for Preservice Teachers: Utilizing Design Thinking Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with elementary digital tools and understanding of educational settings
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers with limited experience in technology-integrated instructional design to engage in self-directed learning and develop technology integration competencies through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three technology-integrated instructional design frameworks using design thinking tools
Learners can propose at least two student-centered technology utilization strategies by analyzing observational data
Learners can develop at least one creative technology application case (e.g., collaborative learning, enhanced student engagement) through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
